events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing dissatisfaction and customer wishes to return the product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new, I tried it on only once and didn’t wear it outside.
Thank you for the information. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label, and we will process your refund within 5 business days of receiving it.
Thanks for the prompt reply and easy solution. I will send the jacket back tomorrow via the label you provide.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund of $120 has been processed. You should see the amount reflected on your bank statement soon.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
